title: How to Make Okonomiyaki

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients.
steps.description: Mix the flour, baking powder, and water (a little at a time)until it makes a smooth batter. Then mix in the egg. Add shredded cabbage, and any other ingredients you like. Mix.

steps.headline: Prepare your cooking surface.
steps.description: Add a little vegetable oil to a frying pan and heat to medium-high heat.

steps.headline: Cook for a few  minutes.
steps.description: Or until side start to brown. Flip and cook another few minutes.

text: Mix the ingredients. Mix the flour, baking powder, and water (a little at a time)until it makes a smooth batter. Then mix in the egg. Add shredded cabbage, and any other ingredients you like. Mix. Prepare your cooking surface. Add a little vegetable oil to a frying pan and heat to medium-high heat. Cook for a few  minutes. Or until side start to brown. Flip and cook another few minutes. Add toppings, cut and serve.
